Name: Our Beautiful Earth 2
About the game: BD Studio Games returns for a second trip around the globe in Our Beautiful Earth 2! Find hidden objects, animals and different items in the most beautiful places of the world. Explore a variety of wonderful scenes and experience different customs and cultures, also see many different kinds of animals. This beautiful earth belongs to all of us.
